description.value:
Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

You create a ring of flowers that release a puff of pollen at your target, clouding and distracting their thoughts. Creatures who fail the @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] suffer a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 2 rounds (1 round on success, -2 status penalty on critical failure). This is a Primal and Poison effect.
